t: Revelation 3

So*r remember*r what*r you*r have*r received*r and*r heard;*r and*r keep*r it,*ir and*r repent.*r Therefore*r if*r you*r do*r not*r wake*r up,*r I*r will*r come*r like*r a*r thief,*r and*r you*r will*r not*r know*r at*r what*r hour*r I*r will*r come*r to*r you.*r

Message to Laodicea
“To*rp the*r angel*r of*r the*r church*r in*r Laodicea*r write:*r The*brp Amen,*r the*r faithful*r and*r true*r Witness,*r the*r Beginning*r of*r the*r creation*r of*r God,*r says*r this:*r
‘I*rp know*r your*r deeds,*r that*r you*r are*r neither*r cold*r nor*r hot;*r I*r wish*r that*r you*r were*r cold*r or*r hot.*r
